subject: [Radiance-general] Webcast of Radiance Workshop 2014
body:
Hi all,

As anticipated by Greg, we've planned to webcast the workshop presentations.

I am running a test tomorrow (26th August) at 6PM BST

http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Radiance+Workshop+2014+-+Live+Webcast+Test&iso=20140826T18&p1=136&am=30


Please join me using the following links:

Google Hangout:
https://plus.google.com/hangouts/_/gzewylk6crb4e7rclknogcocuqa

Webcast: http://www.ustream.tv/channel/radiance2014

Give yourself at least 1/2 hour before the webcast to sign in into Ustream
and Google+ if you haven't already.

If this works, I'll use the same links on the 1st, 2nd and 3rd September to
broadcast the workshop.

See you!
Francesco
